name: Assignment
description: Vehicle assignment to drivers, tracking which driver is assigned to which vehicle for a specific period

properties.name: vehicleId
properties.description: Reference to the vehicle being assigned

properties.name: driverId
properties.description: Reference to the driver receiving the vehicle assignment

properties.name: startDate
properties.description: Start date and time of the assignment

properties.name: endDate
properties.description: End date and time of the assignment (null if ongoing)

properties.name: status
properties.description: Current status of the assignment (active, completed, cancelled)

properties.name: startMileage
properties.description: Vehicle mileage at the start of assignment

properties.name: endMileage
properties.description: Vehicle mileage at the end of assignment

properties.name: notes
properties.description: Additional notes or comments about the assignment
properties.example: Driver requires vehicle for regional deliveries

properties.name: assignedBy
properties.description: Person or system that created the assignment

properties.name: createdAt
properties.description: Timestamp when the assignment record was created

properties.name: updatedAt
properties.description: Timestamp when the assignment record was last updated

examples.notes: Temporary replacement while regular vehicle in maintenance
